channel.title: Shiny on Paul Burgoine
channel.description: Recent content in Shiny on Paul Burgoine

item.title: FPL Data 16-17 Bubble Chart
item.description: Below is a link to a bubble chart I created using Shiny apps, for the data I scraped from the FPL site. The bubbles have hover labels to reveal more information and there is a drop down to include/exclude bench points. Finally there is a slider for gameweek. Click here to view.
